gwt.g2d.client.math
Class MathHelper

java.lang.Object
  gwt.g2d.client.math.MathHelper

public final class MathHelper
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class that provides helper methods for performing math calculation in addition to those in the Math class.

Author:
hao1300@gmail.com
